p:
The indentation experiments were simulated using a strain-gradient CPFE model based on the model proposed by Dunne et al.
72, 73 where plastic deformation is constrained to occur only in directions consistent with crystallographic slip. Recently we successfully demonstrated the use of strain-gradient CPFE for performing 3D simulations of nano-indentation in pure tungsten
34 . Here, we use a modified version of this UMAT to simulate nano-indentation in helium-implanted tungsten.
